fields.name: Donuts?
fields.description: You want breakfast on Saturday? Krispy Kreme donuts. Unfortunately, we cannot accomodate dietary restrictions for this at this time. Sorry!

fields.description: If you don't know what pizza is...

options.name: Cheese
options.description: A classic. Not vegan cheese.

options.name: Pepperoni
options.description: Has pepperoni on it. I don't know what else to tell you. Probably not vegan.

options.name: Hawaiian
options.description: Pineapple and ham. The haters hate it. Idk what your opinion is but it's here if you want it...

options.name: BBQ Chicken

options.description: Vegan cheese + Tomatoes, Olives, Bells, Mushrooms, Artichoke, Red Onion. Vegan option.

options.name: Gluten Free Cheese (G & V)
options.description: Not only is it gluten free, but it's also vegan! Just a gluten free vegan cheese pizza.

options.name: No Thanks!

fields.name: Dietary Restrictions for iniBurger
fields.description: Check all that apply, but only if you want it. Please read and don't just check them all. You get what you order.
